name: Tech Club
description: Explore the frontiers of technology through coding, robotics, and innovation.

name: Cultural Club
description: Celebrate diversity through art, music, dance, and cultural exhibitions.

name: Creators Club
description: Transform ideas into reality through design, content creation, and digital media.

name: Sports Club
description: Excel in athletics, team sports, and fitness activities.

name: Filmy Drama Club
description: Express yourself through theater, film-making, and dramatic performances.

name: Business Club
description: Develop entrepreneurial skills, business acumen, and leadership qualities.

name: Social Welfare Club
description: Make a positive impact through community service and social initiatives.
